summary: This is an email chain between legal team members discussing a Daily Mail article where Ghislaine Maxwell gave an interview from prison. The team is trying to locate their motion requesting the use of pseudonyms in the case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of a Daily Mail interview from behind bars, mentioned as the central figure in the email chain.

events.title: Daily Mail publishes Maxwell interview
events.description: The Daily Mail publishes an article containing an interview with Ghislaine Maxwell from prison.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell gave an interview from prison to a Daily Mail reporter, which was published on or around November 13, 2021.
Maxwell's legal team was aware of the interview and was discussing it internally via email.
The legal team was trying to locate their own motion requesting the use of pseudonyms in the case, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
The email chain shows coordination among legal team members regarding media coverage of their client.
